title: Grasslands
description: Earth's surface is covered in many different environments. In Grasslands, students will get a comprehensive look at a diverse biome that is found on almost every continent, and the plants and animals that manage to survive there. Detailed photographs and an engaging topic will help students practice comparing and contrasting information. The book can also be used to teach students how to connect to prior knowledge to better understand the text.
